SafariWildPaytable.PayoutDesc1: Some symbols may occupy 2 to 3 symbols' spaces and each of these symbols will represent as a single symbol during payout calculations.
SafariWildPaytable.PayoutDesc2: Wild symbol substitutes for all symbols except Scatter symbol.
SafariWildPaytable.PayoutDesc3: Wild symbol appears on reels 3 and 4 only.
SafariWildPaytable.BetWaysDesc1: Bet ways win if the winning symbols are in succession from the leftmost reel to the right.
SafariWildPaytable.BetWaysDesc2: Total number of winning bet ways for each symbol is calculated by multiplying the number of adjacent winning symbols on each symbol from the leftmost reel to the right.
SafariWildPaytable.BetWaysDesc3: The winning symbol payout is multiplied by the number of winning bet ways.
SafariWildPaytable.BetWaysDesc4: After the payout of every round is made, all winning symbols will explode allowing the symbols above them to cascade down for a new round.
SafariWildPaytable.BetWaysDesc5: Additional winning combination will be tallied in every round until no more winning combination can be tallied.

SafariWildRule.Rule1: Safari Wilds is a 6-reels (5 rows in reels 1, 2, 5 and 6, 6 rows in reels 3 and 4) video slot featuring Wild Transformation reels and increasing multiplier.

Rule2.value: The game is played with 20 base bet for %{400} ways - %{22500} ways, bet level of 1 to 10 and bet size of  %{minChip} to %{maxChip}.
Rule2.comment: Both %{minChip}, %{maxChip} will be replaced by the currency symbol, do not translate. Both %{20} and %{400} will be formatted accordingly, do not translate.
Rule2.example: The game is played with 20 base bet for 400 ways - 15,625 ways, bet level of 1 to 10 and bet size of 0.1 to 10.

Rule3.comment: %{currency} will be replaced by the currency symbol, do not translate.

SafariWildRule.Rule4: After the payout of every round is made, all winning symbols will explode allowing the symbols above them to cascade down for a new round.
SafariWildRule.Rule5: Additional winning combination will be tallied in every round until no more winning combination can be tallied.
SafariWildRule.SymbolRules1: Some symbols may occupy 2 to 3 symbols' spaces and each of these symbols will represent as a single symbol during payout calculations.
SafariWildRule.SymbolRules2: Wild symbol substitutes for all symbols except Scatter symbol.
SafariWildRule.SymbolRules3: Wild symbol appears on reels 3 and 4 only.
SafariWildRule.SymbolRules4: Free Spins Feature is played at the same bet size and bet level as the spin that triggered the Free Spins Feature.

SafariWildShared.WildTransformDesc1: At every new round after the new symbols have cascaded down, any symbol(s) in reels 3 and 4 that is involved in a win in the previous round will be transformed into a Wild symbol(s).
SafariWildShared.MultiplierReelDesc1: During any spin, all wins will be multiplied by the multiplier shown below the reels, starting with x1 in the first round.
SafariWildShared.MultiplierReelDesc2: Any win in the first round will increase the second round's multiplier to x2.
SafariWildShared.MultiplierReelDesc3: Any win in the second round will increase the third round's multiplier to x3.
SafariWildShared.MultiplierReelDesc4: Any win in the third round will increase the fourth round's (and beyond) multiplier to x5.
SafariWildShared.FreeSpinFeatureDesc1: 4 Scatter symbols appearing anywhere will trigger the Free Spins Feature with 12 free spins. Each additional Scatter symbol will trigger 2 more free spins.
SafariWildShared.FreeSpinFeatureDesc2: During the Free Spins Feature, the multipliers below the reels will be increased to x2, x4, x6 and x10 respectively.
SafariWildShared.MaximumWinDesc1: The maximum win amount is %{5000}x of the bet amount.
SafariWildShared.MaximumWinDesc2: If the total win in the main game or the Free Spins Feature reaches %{5000}x of the bet amount, the spin ends.
